name: Jewel Mania
description:
Jewel Mania - The new match 3 sensation is here, with brilliant jewels in over 600 dazzling puzzles!

Accompany your perky pup on a magical journey filled with waves of excitement and brilliant visuals! Swap jewels to clear the way, and match 4 or more pieces to crush each challenge that lies ahead.

Jewel Mania – the ultimate free puzzle game!

JEWEL MANIA FEATURES:

MATCH JEWELS in 600+ unique puzzles!
- Match jewels to blast your way through more than 600 different puzzles! Each match you create will propel you one step farther in this amazing fantasy world.

DAZZLING PUZZLES challenge you to keep the fun flowing!
- Flow from one challenge to the next as you crush puzzles with ease! Match jewels to keep the puzzle blitz going! Don’t miss a beat, or your game might just be over.

CREATE COMBOS and trigger amazing cascades!
- Ignite crazy combos by using rare jewels at the right time. Blast the board clear and watch your score blossom!

DISCOVER rare Magic Diamonds and Rainbow Stars!
- Use the mysterious power of Magic Diamonds to make big matches, and channel the force of colorful Rainbow Stars to match your way out of tight spots! With powers like these, you’ll have a blast matching your way through our games.

MASTER tricky obstacles like walls, pitfalls, and puzzling portals!
- Different games challenge you with different obstacles. Avoid pitfalls and flow through portals as you progress through this mysterious, magical saga!

VISIT beautiful backgrounds and amazing places with your puppy companion!
- Head out on an epic saga as you and your magical companions travel across mystical worlds solving confounding puzzles.

EASY TO LEARN - hard to master! Can you earn 3 stars on every level?
- Use every bit of magical strength you have to crush each level’s high scores! You’ll only earn 3 stars when you have truly mastered each area.

TOP-NOTCH performance! Animated jewels, effects, and characters!
- Watch in awe as magical effects blossom to blast the board clear. Experience amazing animations and incredible effects!

FREE updates with new puzzles, boosts, and more!
- Jewel Mania is totally free to download and free to play! Watch out for even more free updates as time goes on.

Jewel Mania is the BEST-looking FREE jewel matching game for your iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch! Immerse yourself in a magical kingdom filled with match 3 puzzles, cute companions and mystical mystery.

Fans of candy and jewel games will love Jewel Mania! Download today and start your adventure!

Please note: Your device must have an active internet connection to download additional levels.

Please note that Jewel Mania™ is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to Settings Menu -> General -> Restrictions option. You can then simply turn off In-App Purchases under "Allowed Content". In addition, Jewel Mania™ may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have access to your information through such services.
